Articles.Content:
Maybe it's me, but I launch most of my rockets directly after building them in the VAB. Sometimes I want an alternative crew lay out. If it takes a few times to get the launch right, I have to think about changing the crew everytime I want to do the launch.

So, I would like to be able to 'save' the fact that I want 2 instead of 3 Kerbals. Please?

Not only that, but saving how we want eventual other pods pre-populated would be great, too.

It's on the Already Suggested list, too - under Crew Deployment I guess.
